Title: The Fifteenth Moon
Designer: Wang Xindian (王新淀)Cao Shuqin (曹淑勤)
Publisher: Liaoning meishu chubanshe (辽宁美术出版社)
Notes: "The Fifteenth Moon" is a song composed by lyricist Shi Xiang (石祥), and the composers Tie Yuan (铁源) and Xu Xiyi (徐锡宜), arranged by Lou Lianguang (娄连广), and sung by Dong Zhenhou (董振厚). The song was composed in 1984 and first performed during the 1985 New Year's extravaganza (春晚). One of the later performers of the song has been Peng Liyuan (1991).
